backend/main.mo: Main actor managing user profiles with visibility rules, chat messages, and access‑controlled operations using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to the new format by adding a default empty number field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level application shell handling navigation between About, Chat, Members, and Profile views with authentication‑aware UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper that shows a sign‑in prompt until the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/about/AboutPage.ts: Renders the About page describing the platform and onboarding steps using cards and icons.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat interface with message display, sending, admin deletion, and real-time updates.
frontend/src/features/chat/useAuthorDisp: Returns a user's display name from their profile or a default anonymous label.
frontend/src/features/members/MembersPag: Shows a members directory with search and filtering, gated by authentication.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileFor: Provides a form to edit and validate user profiles including visibility and optional fields.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfilePag: Loads the user's profile and renders the profile form with save handling.
frontend/src/features/profile/validatePr: Validates profile fields such as display name, bio, links, and public-profile business fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Exposes authentication status and principal from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, chat messages, admin checks, and member directory using an actor from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for color themes and typography, including dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, spacing, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, requirements, architecture notes, and current state version.
